text: Eden Hazard (Born 7 January 1991) is a former Belgian footballer. Over a 16-year career he played for Lille, Chelsea and Real Madrid, as well as for the Belgium national team. He made 126 appearances for Belgium, scoring 33 goals. Hazard is regarded as one of the best players of his generation. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:People from Hainaut (province) Category:Real Madrid players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:Belgium at UEFA Euro 2016 Category:Belgium at the 2014 FIFA World Cup Category:Belgium at the 2018 FIFA World Cup Category:Belgium at the 2022 FIFA World Cup
title: Eden Hazard
